name: agent-usage
title: Agent Usage
description: Track Codex, Claude, Cursor, Gemini, Antigravity, Copilot, and optional provider usage limits in Raycast.
author: nedim_perva

commands.name: agent-usage
commands.title: Agent Usage
commands.description: View usage snapshots and remaining limits across providers.

preferences.name: codexAuthToken
preferences.title: Codex Auth Token (Optional)
preferences.description: Optional Bearer token override. Leave empty to auto-read ~/.codex/auth.json.

preferences.name: claudeAccessToken
preferences.title: Claude OAuth Access Token (Optional)
preferences.description: Optional OAuth token override. Leave empty to auto-read Claude credentials file.

preferences.name: geminiAccessToken
preferences.title: Gemini OAuth Access Token (Optional)
preferences.description: Optional OAuth token override. Leave empty to auto-read ~/.gemini/oauth_creds.json.

preferences.name: antigravityCsrfToken
preferences.title: Antigravity CSRF Token (Optional)
preferences.description: CSRF token required by local Antigravity language server endpoints.

preferences.name: copilotApiToken
preferences.title: Copilot API Token (Optional)
preferences.description: Optional manual token. You can also use device login from the command actions.

preferences.name: cursorCookieHeader
preferences.title: Cursor Cookie Header (Optional)
preferences.description: Optional cookie header for Cursor web API (from an active cursor.com session).

preferences.name: cursorCookieSourceMode
preferences.title: Cursor Cookie Source
preferences.description: Auto tries cached/environment/browser cookies; Manual uses only Cursor Cookie Header.

preferences.name: checkProviderStatus
preferences.label: Enable Provider Status Checks
preferences.description: Show status highlights when providers report degraded/outage state.

preferences.name: openrouterApiKey
preferences.title: OpenRouter API Key (Optional)
preferences.description: OpenRouter API key for credits and key quota endpoints.

preferences.name: zaiApiKey
preferences.title: z.ai API Key (Optional)
preferences.description: z.ai API key for usage quota endpoint.

preferences.name: kimiK2ApiKey
preferences.title: Kimi K2 API Key (Optional)
preferences.description: Kimi K2 API key for credit usage endpoint.

preferences.name: ampCookieHeader
preferences.title: Amp Cookie Header (Optional)
preferences.description: Cookie header from an authenticated ampcode.com/settings request.

preferences.name: ampCookieSourceMode
preferences.title: Amp Cookie Source
preferences.description: Auto tries manual/cached/env/browser cookies; Manual uses only Amp Cookie Header.

preferences.name: minimaxApiKey
preferences.title: MiniMax API Key (Optional)
preferences.description: MiniMax API key for coding plan remains endpoint.

preferences.name: minimaxCookieHeader
preferences.title: MiniMax Cookie Header (Optional)
preferences.description: Cookie header or cURL from an authenticated platform.minimax.io session.

preferences.name: minimaxCookieSourceMode
preferences.title: MiniMax Cookie Source
preferences.description: Auto tries manual/cached/env/browser cookies when API key is unavailable.

preferences.name: opencodeCookieHeader
preferences.title: OpenCode Cookie Header (Optional)
preferences.description: Cookie header from an authenticated opencode.ai session.

preferences.name: opencodeCookieSourceMode
preferences.title: OpenCode Cookie Source
preferences.description: Auto tries manual/cached/env/browser cookies; Manual uses only OpenCode Cookie Header.

preferences.name: codexUsageUrl
preferences.title: Codex Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the Codex action.

preferences.name: claudeUsageUrl
preferences.title: Claude Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the Claude action.

preferences.name: geminiUsageUrl
preferences.title: Gemini Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the Gemini action.

preferences.name: antigravityServerUrl
preferences.title: Antigravity Server URL (Optional)
preferences.description: Local Antigravity language server base URL (for example http://127.0.0.1:8080).

preferences.name: antigravityUsageUrl
preferences.title: Antigravity Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the Antigravity action.

preferences.name: copilotUsageUrl
preferences.title: Copilot Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the Copilot action.

preferences.name: cursorUsageUrl
preferences.title: Cursor Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the Cursor action.

preferences.name: openrouterApiBaseUrl
preferences.title: OpenRouter API Base URL (Optional)
preferences.description: Default is https://openrouter.ai/api/v1.

preferences.name: zaiQuotaUrl
preferences.title: z.ai Quota URL (Optional)
preferences.description: Default is https://api.z.ai/api/monitor/usage/quota/limit.

preferences.name: opencodeWorkspaceId
preferences.title: OpenCode Workspace ID (Optional)
preferences.description: Optional wrk_... override for OpenCode usage fetch.

preferences.name: openrouterUsageUrl
preferences.title: OpenRouter Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the OpenRouter action.

preferences.name: zaiUsageUrl
preferences.title: z.ai Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the z.ai action.

preferences.name: kimiK2UsageUrl
preferences.title: Kimi K2 Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the Kimi K2 action.

preferences.name: ampUsageUrl
preferences.title: Amp Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the Amp action.

preferences.name: minimaxUsageUrl
preferences.title: MiniMax Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the MiniMax action.

preferences.name: opencodeUsageUrl
preferences.title: OpenCode Usage URL
preferences.description: Usage page opened by the OpenCode action.
